description: This file contains a class 'NotesRepository' that manages database interactions for notes, including CRUD operations with an SQLite database.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A repository class providing CRUD operations for notes stored in a SQLite database.

methods.name: None __init__(self, connection: Optional[sqlite3.Connection] = None)
methods.description: Initializes the repository with an optional database connection, creating a new one if none is provided.

methods.name: None __del__(self)
methods.description: Closes the database connection if the repository owns it upon deletion.

methods.name: Note _row_to_note(self, row: dict)
methods.description: Converts a database row dictionary into a Note object.

methods.name: Note create(self, title: str, content: str)
methods.description: Creates a new note with the given title and content, returning the created Note object.

methods.name: Optional[Note] get_by_id(self, note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, returning None if not found.

methods.name: Tuple[List[Note],int] list(self, q: Optional[str], page: int, limit: int)
methods.description: Lists notes matching an optional search query with pagination, returning a tuple of notes and total count.

methods.name: Optional[Note] update(self, note_id: int, title: Optional[str], content: Optional[str])
methods.description: Updates an existing note's title and/or content, returning the updated Note or None if not found.

methods.name: bool delete(self, note_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, returning True if successful, False otherwise.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^    def create(self, title: str, content: str) -> Note:$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^    def list(self, q: Optional[str], page: int, limit: int) -> Tuple[List[Note], int]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, q: Optional[str], page: int, limit: int)

ctags.name: update
ctags.pattern: /^    def update(self, note_id: int, title: Optional[str], content: Optional[str]) -> Optional[Not/
ctags.signature: (self, note_id: int, title: Optional[str], content: Optional[str])
